message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a great asset to you as well. Considering its importance, I'm offering it to you at a special price of $12000. I understand that its worth to you is $8000, but this deal presents a unique chance to save a considerable amount while securing a valuable resource. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making an offer.
